Template.HtmlPart:
Hi {{name}},

Thank you for renewing your HospoSure subscription, you're all set to continue modelling!

Sign In

Use the Templates

Did you know HospoSure has hundreds of templated line items you can import to help you model and build? Simply change your venue view to Template at any time and then use the search feature to filter the list.

Different Business Models

Have you thought of experimenting with different business models and want to compare them? Increase your subscription quantity and you can use the new venues to compare different ideas and concepts.

Fine-Tuning and Hospitality Mentorship

We partner with Clever Cafe Company, leaders in cafe-specific business coaching, to provide subsidised mentorship ensuring you receive additional support when you need it.

We're stoked you're here and want to make your startup or established cafe the best it can be. If you have any questions or need assistance along the way, please reach out to us anytime at hello@hosposure.com.au. Take good care and enjoy the journey!

Privacy Policy | Terms & Conditions

Copyright © 2026 HospoSure Pty Ltd.
All rights reserved.
Template.TextPart:
Hi {{name}},

Thank you for renewing your HospoSure subscription, you're all set to continue modelling!

Go to app.hosposure.com.au to sign in.

Use the Templates
Did you know HospoSure has hundreds of templated line items you can import to help you model and build? Simply change your venue view to Template at any time and then use the search feature to filter the list.

Different Business Models
Have you thought of experimenting with different business models and want to compare them? Increase your subscription quantity and you can use the new venues to compare different ideas and concepts.

Fine-Tuning and Hospitality Mentorship
We partner with Clever Cafe Company CleverCafeCompany.com.au, leaders in cafe-specific business coaching, to provide subsidised mentorship ensuring you receive additional support when you need it.

We're stoked you're here and want to make your startup or established cafe the best it can be. If you have any questions or need assistance along the way, please reach out to us anytime at hello@hosposure.com.au. Take good care and enjoy the journey!

HospoSure | Your cafe with confidence
